roleset.name: hamper or confine as if in a bottleneck
roleset.note: BOTTLENECK-V NOTES: Framed by Claire (from bottleneck.01-v)

role.descr: entity confined, stuck in the bottleneck
confined-to, thing acting as the bottleneck itself

example.name: Roads as thing bottlenecked
example.text: For those of us that actually use it, it's wonderful -- instead of [Powhatan and Chesterfield]-2 being bottlenecked *-2 by lack of roads.

example.name: All arguments, more straight-forward with roads as place confined-to
example.src: All arguments, more straight-forward with roads as place confined-to
example.type: All arguments, more straight-forward with roads as place confined-to
example.text: After the accident, the wreckage and ambulence bottlenecked cars on I-95 for hours.
